attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2005-0054

Date: 2005-02-01

                     Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Natural Resources, pursuant to subsections 21(2) and 21.1(1) of the National Energy Board Act, hereby approves the issuance by the National Energy Board to FortisBC Inc. of Amending Orders AO-3-EC-40 and AO-4-EC-41, copies of which are attached to this Order.


                     Sur recommandation du ministre des Ressources naturelles et en vertu des paragraphes 21(2) et 21.1(1) de la Loi sur l’Office national de l’énergie, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil agrée la délivrance à FortisBC Inc., par l’Office national de l’énergie, des ordonnances modificatrices AO-3-EC-40 et AO-4-EC-41, dont on trouvera copies ci-jointes.
